summary: A comprehensive pytest‑based test suite that validates the core functionality of the SentenceTransformer library, including model loading, encoding, training, evaluation, backend export/import, multi‑process computation, image handling, model card generation, and utility metrics such as similarity and distance calculations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability and performance of sentence‑embedding models across different configurations and deployment backends, thereby supporting reliable NLP applications and facilitating continuous integration for the library.
